title: Intento Raises $3 Million to Serve Increasing Demand of Global Companies for AI Transformation
excerpt: Round led by Flint Capital; Intento hires top COO to scale global operations BERKELEY, CA / ACCESSWIRE / July 1, 2020 / Intento, a leading AI integration platform, today announces it has closed a $3 million seed round to expand its AI integration platform and meet the growing demand of global companies for AI transformation.
